com.gridgraph.storage.heap.page

Class HeapPage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gridgraph.storage.heap.page.HeapPage
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EdgePrimaryHeapPage, EdgeSecondaryHeapPage, PropertiesHeapPage, VertexDegreeHeapPage, VertexPrimaryHeapPage

    public abstract class HeapPage
extends Object
    A HeapPage represents a fixed size block of binary data read from and written to file and cached as mapped memory
    Author:
    guobao.chen

        public boolean isFileEndReached(long internalId)

        Returns:
        true if size of file is reached
